name: Caramelized French Onion Soup
description: Warm up with a cozy bowl of French Onion Soup, where the flavours of rich, caramelized onions meet our savoury beef broth in a speedy and scrumptious soup. Top it off with toasted cheesy bread, and you've got yourself a timeless classic with a modern twist. Perfect for wowing your dinner party guests or just treating yourself to some vintage comfort.

ingredients.name: French Onion Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Heat oil in Wok or a large pot over medium-high heat. Thinly slice onions; add to Wok, and slowly cook, stirring often, until onions are lightly golden, about 15 min.
While onions are cooking, preheat oven to 350° F.
To Wok, add water, Better Than Beef Broth Mix, French Onion Dip Mix, and mustard, if using. Simmer 8–10 min.
Place bread slices on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Top with cheese and bake until melted and golden, about 3–4 min.
Pour soup into bowls and top with toasted cheese bread.
tips: Use your favourite vegan cheese for a vegan version of the soup!

products.name: Better Than Beef Broth Mix
summary: You won’t believe it’s not beef! This vegan/plant-based broth mix is packed with beefy flavour, mushroom and inactive nutritional yeast powders, and organic tamari powder. Ready in minutes, this one-step broth creates a rich base for your favourite soups and can be used anywhere you want to “beef” things up!

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savoury dish where you’d like to liven up the flavour with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
